product_name: Patagonia Micro D Crew Neck Pullover Top - Toddler Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Made of microdenier polyester fleece, the Patagonia Micro D crew neck pullover top can be worn alone or as a midlayer to keep little ones warm and comfortable. Lightweight, breathable, quick-drying top is constructed to let little ones move easily. The Patagonia Micro D crew neck pullover top will hold up to constant wear and regular washing. Lap-over rib collar makes it easy to put on and take off. Smooth, flat-seam construction ensures chafe-free comfort. Closeout.
